Name: Small Biomimetic Blood
Description: Gives 3 bottles of Biomimetic Blood directly (For team resurrection/stage restart).
WorldDesc: A small bottle of Biomimetic Blood.

Description: Gives 6 bottles of Biomimetic Blood directly (For team resurrection/stage restart).
WorldDesc: A medium bottle of Biomimetic Blood.

Description: Gives 9 bottles of Biomimetic Blood directly (For team resurrection/stage restart).

Name: Special Biomimetic Blood
Description: Gives 12 bottles of Biomimetic Blood directly (For team resurrection/stage restart).
WorldDesc: Biomimetic Blood made in a special method.

Name: Desire to Survive
Description: Each node cleared grants 1 extra bottle of Biomimetic Blood (For team resurrection/stage restart).
WorldDesc: A broken emblem made in ancient style. Can slightly increase the Biomimetic Blood obtained after clearing a node.

Name: Master Inviter
WorldDesc: A proof of friendship with the outlier. Use it to gain bonus Recruitment Voucher Refresh Attempts.

Name: Negotiation Skills
WorldDesc: A proof of friendship with merchants. Use it to gain more discount slots in the shop.

Name: Assistance Resonance
Description: Upon triggering a QTE, triggers the QTE of another character. Cooldown: 5s.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Polarized Strength
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Diverted Strength
Description: Basic Attack Extra DMG Bonus decreases by 50%. Gains one Signal Orb every 2s.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Diverted Kinetic
Description: Dodges consume double the Dodge Gauge value. Gains one Signal Orb every 2s.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Be Decisive
Description: Extra DMG Bonus +80%. Each existing Signal Orb reduces the bonus effect by 5%.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Extra Help
Description: Each existing Signal Orb increases the Extra DMG Bonus by 5%.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Auto Power
Description: Restores Signature Energy equal to 1% of the Energy (which is not full).
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Specialized Shield
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Last Resort
Description: Every 5s, gains 5% Extra DMG Bonus and loses 5% Extra DMG Reduction, up to 100%.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Extra Signal
Description: Each 3-Ping grants 1 orb of the same color.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Computing Power Overflow
Description: Upon casting a Signature, triggers an extra Matrix.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Energy Cycle
Description: Upon casting a Signature, restores half of the Signature Energy consumed.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Superconductive Energy Lv.2
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Superconductive Energy Lv.3
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Deployment Blast
Description: Upon switching to a new character, deals DMG equal to 500% of the new character's ATK to all enemies within 6m.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Master Recruiter
Description: All Recruitment Vouchers' Bonus Recruitment Attempts +1.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Artifact Hunter
Description: All Item Boxes have a bigger chance to give a Rare/Legendary item.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: Artifact Energy
Description: Each Artifact grants 10% Extra DMG Bonus.
WorldDesc: A special ancient emblem that possesses some kind of special power.

Name: The Returner's Blade
Description: It doesn't seem to have any special effects...
WorldDesc: A blade dropped after defeating the Ocean Guardian. It was crafted by artisans of ancient times and passed a long time. It's likely to be useful on some important occasion...

Name: The Brand of Void
WorldDesc: A mark that does not belong to the world, carrying the will that seems to have come from another world.

Name: The Brand of Infinity
WorldDesc: A mark that does not belong to the world, carrying the will that seems to have come from another world.

Name: Merlin's Jewel
Description: Recovers 5% of max HP per second.
WorldDesc: A gem that gives off a dim blue light. Crafted with an ancient technique that was long lost, this gem named "Merlin" is a treasure that has been passed on through generations in a family.

Name: Indigo Wave Amethyst
Description: CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG increase by 40% and 100% respectively.
WorldDesc: A gem that gives off a dim indigo light and was crafted with an ancient technique that was long lost. When you put it next to your ear, you could hear the faint sound of waves coming from the gem.

Name: Broken Indigo Wave Amethyst
WorldDesc: A gem shard obtained by violently disassembling a mechanism. There is still some power left in it.

Name: Clyphas Black Codex
Description: Restores 3 Energy every second. Takes DMG equal to 5% max HP every second. And gain a 30% Signature Extra DMG Bonus.
WorldDesc: A black codex with knowledge of ancient taboos. Although it might contain some wisdom, it's better to be buried in the distant past.

Name: Saphorus White Codex
Description: Restores 3 Energy every second. Restores 2% max HP every second. And gain a 30% Signature Extra DMG Bonus.
WorldDesc: A white codex with ancient knowledge. The first disciples should have been the ones who were closest to the ancient wisdom, but unfortunately, even their knowledge was lost in the long process of history.

Name: Red Teardrop Pendant
WorldDesc: A pendant with a red teardrop gem from a famous collector. Many are attracted by the various treasures lying deep under the sea and would even risk their lives to get them.

Name: Blue Teardrop Pendant
WorldDesc: A pendant with a blue teardrop gem from a famous collector. Many are attracted by the various treasures lying deep under the sea and would even risk their lives to get them.

Name: Yellow Teardrop Pendant
WorldDesc: A pendant with a yellow teardrop gem from a famous collector. Many are attracted by the various treasures lying deep under the sea and would even risk their lives to get them.

Name: Unstudied Antique Book
Description: Gains 6 random Signal Orbs at the beginning of the battle.
WorldDesc: The antique book that has been passed on through generations in an ancient school, whose founder seems to be the heir of a mythological hero. The knowledge passed on through a single bloodline failed to bring happiness to the world and eventually met its end.

Name: Scholar's Notes
Description: Gains 3 random Signal Orbs at the beginning of the battle.
WorldDesc: The notes left by a young scholar. It records what he saw and heard while traveling the world. Although he was not talented enough, he wished to make up for it by hard work.

Name: Note of the Ludicrous
Description: Gains 3 random sets of 3-Ping Orbs at the beginning of the battle.
WorldDesc: A note left by a certain ludicrous man who was still writing before until the last minute of his life. Pursuing something out of reach will eventually lead to madness.

Name: Sword of the Nameless
Description: Extra DMG Bonus +50%. Recovery speed of Signal Orbs by Basic Attack -50%.
WorldDesc: A sword left by someone unknown. Crafted with the lost forging technology, it is still as sharp as a new blade even after numerous battles.

Name: Black Nat
WorldDesc: A battle bot made by imitating the lost mechanical technology. It could play a important role on the battlefield.

Name: Auto Cannon Omega
WorldDesc: An auto cannon made with modern mechanical technology. It can offer fire support.

Name: Vista
Description: Characters' ATK increases by 7% ATK every 10s when they are on the field. Stacks up to 3 times.
WorldDesc: A well crafted scepter that seems to be a replica of the weapon wielded by a hero from the Mythical Age.

Name: Sun Bird
Description: When switched in, characters' ATK increases by 7% for 10s. Stacks up to 3 times.
WorldDesc: A worn-out banner spear that seems to be a replica of the weapon wielded by a hero from the Mythical Age.

Name: The Defector's Family Crest
WorldDesc: A family crest owned by a defector who ran away at some point. The defector will eventually return to the sea and be buried deep under it.

Name: Heavy Blade of the Executioner
WorldDesc: The heavy blade dropped after defeating the mechanoid left by an ancient civilization. It is not a weapon that anyone can wield. In the war of the Mythical Age, mechanoids were the main force on the battlefield.

Name: Retail Biomimetic Blood (S)
Description: Gives 3 bottles of Biomimetic Blood directly (For team resurrection/stage restart).
WorldDesc: A small bottle of Biomimetic Blood. It's a Shark-speare Sale exclusive retail version and can be obtained repeatedly.

Name: Retail Biomimetic Blood (M)
Description: Gives 6 bottles of Biomimetic Blood directly (For team resurrection/stage restart).
WorldDesc: A medium bottle of Biomimetic Blood. It's a Shark-speare Sale exclusive retail version and can be obtained repeatedly.

Name: Retail Biomimetic Blood (L)
Description: Gives 9 bottles of Biomimetic Blood directly (For team resurrection/stage restart).
WorldDesc: A large bottle of Biomimetic Blood. It's a Shark-speare Sale exclusive retail version and can be obtained repeatedly.

Name: Star Core
Description: Gains 3 sets of 3-Ping Orbs at the beginning of the battle.
WorldDesc: The shard of a meteorite that fell from the fake night sky. During the Mythical Age, unsung heroes used to be drifting under the starry night, exploring the unknown possibilities in the lonely universe.
